result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on January 3, 2023 at 09:30 am.
Per Judge Milanowski, warrant to be quashed due to Defendant's hospitalization.  Case was set for status on 1/3/23.

9:39 AM Defendant Katie M. Allen not in court.  Attorney Courtney Christine Jolin in court for Katie M. Allen.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense does not know whereabouts of client.  Court authorizes BODY ONLY warrant.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Maintain absolute sobriety

1:38 PM Defendant Katie M. Allen in court with out counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Voluntary appearance after bench warrant was issued. Court notes this is her 3 voluntary appearance on failed court appearances. Warrant quashed. Additional cash bond set $250.00 cash or jail. Conditions maintain absolute sobriety. Bond Form.
Initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Made voluntary appearance.
9:25 AM Defendant Katie M. Allen not in court.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court authorizes bench warrant on non appearance $1,000.00 CASH.

1:04 PM Defendant Katie M. Allen in court without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant states her ride fell through and she was unable to get to last court hearing.  Defendant states she has contacted public defender's office, and is PD eligible.  Attorney Jolin present in court.  Advises defendant she needs to complete evaluation.  Court quashes warrant.  State denies motion to forfeit bond.  Court reinstates prior cash bond which was previously posted.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of $250.00

10:17 AM Defendant Katie M. Allen not in court.  ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin. State motions to forfeit bond.  State grants forfeiture.  Forfeiture review to be set on Clerk's calendar.  Bench warrant authorized due to non-appearance - BODY ONLY

Defendant appears by zoom without counsel. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court withdraws order for warrant and reinstates bond. Defendant received complaint. Court adjourns initial appearance to May 23rd at 10:00 am. Must appear in court if counsel is appointed. Can appear by zoom if counsel is not appointed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Katie M. Allen in court without counsel. Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant received complaint. Court adjourns initial appearance to April 25th at 10:00 am. bond continued.

Defendant appears by video in the Vilas County Jail without counsel. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court makes finding of probable cause. Court sets $250.00 cash bond. Conditions, Maintain absolute sobriety. Court sets initial appearance to March 24th at 1:30pm.
